messages.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: Pia Schrattenholz
To: nihonto@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, December 02, 2005 11:32 AM
Subject: kanji puzzle?


Hi all.
I would appreciate some help with this mei seen at the photosection named, Hizen Ju Fujiwara Kunihira. Have I done the translation right or do you find and doubt about it. Thankyou so much.
Best Regards
Allan
